examples.input: Jane thought today is 3/11/2002, but today is in fact Mar 12, which is 1 day later. What is the date one year ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
examples.A: Today is Mar 12, which is 03/12/2002. One year ago from today would be the same date but in the previous year, which is 03/12/2001. So the answer is 03/12/2001.

examples.input: The deadline is Jun 1, 2021, which is 2 days away from now. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
examples.A: Jun 1, 2021 is 2 days away from now, so today is May 30, 2021. 10 days ago from May 30, 2021 is May 20, 2021. So the answer is 05/20/2021.

examples.input: Jane was born on the last day of Feburary in 2000. Today is her 16-year-old birthday. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
examples.A: Jane was born on the last day of February in 2000, which is 02/29/2000. Today is her 16-year-old birthday, so today is 02/29/2016. 10 days ago from 02/29/2016 is 02/19/2016. So the answer is 02/19/2016.

examples.input: It was Sept. 1st, 2021 a week ago. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
examples.A: Sept. 1st, 2021 was a week ago, so today is Sept. 8, 2021. 10 days ago from Sept. 8, 2021 is Aug. 29, 2021. So the answer is 08/29/2021.
